title: Here Comes The Sun
lyrics: x2 Here comes the sun Here comes the sun And i say its all right   Little dar - ling, its been a long, cold, lonely winter Little dar - ling it feels like years since its been here Here c omes the sun Here comes the sun And i say its all right    Little dar - ling, the smile's re turning to their faces, Little dar - ling, it seems like years since its been here Here c omes t he sun Here comes the sun And i say its all right         X5 Sun, sun, sun, here it comes   Little dar - ling, i feel that ice is slowly melting , Little dar - ling, it seems like years since its been clear Here comes the sun Here comes the sun And i say its all right   Here comes the sun. Here comes the sun Its alright
